node.title: Why it's a great time to be a Spider-Man fan
node.alt: Spiderman jumps of a building in a scene from Into the Spider-Verse.
node.description: A stack of Spider-Man-related movies are set to swing into cinemas, and fans of the web-spinning superhero couldn't be happier.
node.content:
["From some perspectives, Marvel's\u00a0superhero boom is slowing down.", "The Marvel Cinematic Universe's (MCU's) latest entry, Eternals, landed the franchise its first \"rotten\" rating on critic aggregator Rotten Tomatoes, while\u00a0the post-COVID box office has seen\u00a0the last three films from the comic book makers-turned-film-studio struggle to make back their massive budgets at cinemas.", "But for fans of one Marvel superhero \u2014 your friendly neighbourhood Spider-Man \u2014\u00a0the future has never looked brighter.", "Beware - some mild spoilers for Spider-Man: No Way Home lay ahead.", "
Across the Spider-Verse
", "Unlike other Marvel characters, Sony holds the film rights to Spider-Man, having bought\u00a0them from\u00a0a cash-strapped Marvel in 1998 for the measly sum of US$7 million.", "Sony now \"lends\" Spider-Man back to the MCU\u00a0but is free to do what it wants with the\u00a0various sidekicks, villains and other supporting characters.", "One of Sony's first forays into this wider world was Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse, which won an Academy Award for best animated film and received near unanimous glowing reviews.", "It focused on Miles Morales (voiced by\u00a0Shameik Moore), a 13-year-old kid who takes up the mantle of Spider-Man and comes face-to-face with a whole multiverse of similarly powered Spider-heroes.", "Across the Spider-Verse (Part One) is still 10 months away from release and its sequel isn't due until 2023, but fans are already excited.", "
Everything's coming up Tom
", "But before then, fans have the MCU's third Spider-Man film to look forward to, which also promises a multiverse worth of possibilities.", "Tom Holland returns as Peter Parker AKA Spider-Man in No Way Home, which sees him ask sorcerer Doctor\u00a0Strange (Benedict Cumberbatch) to perform a spell to erase the public's knowledge of his secret identity.", "When the spell goes wrong, it allows villains from other multiverses to enter the MCU, all hell-bent on killing Spider-Man.", "Marvel and Sony have already revealed stars from previous Spider-Man films will return for No Way Home - Willem Dafoe's Green Goblin and Alfred Molina's Doctor Octopus from the Sam Raimi-directed trilogy are back, plus Jamie Foxx's Electro from the Marc Webb-directed series.", "The trailer also shows Sandman (from Spider-Man 3) and The Lizard (from The Amazing Spider-Man), but the filmmakers have been tight-lipped about whether previous Peter Parkers Tobey Maguire and Andrew Garfield will be making an appearance in the film.", "", "
Tobey Maguire, Tom Holland and Andrew Garfield (left to right) are Hollywood's Spider-Men. Could the new film feature all three?(Supplied: Sony)
", "Either way, fans are buzzing about No Way Home, with ticket pre-sales breaking records and box-office watchers predicting the film could see a return to pre-pandemic gross levels.", "On top of that, Sony producer Amy Pascal revealed plans for three more Spider-Man MCU movies starring Tom Holland, though Marvel and their owners Disney are yet to officially confirm this.", "But it's not just the fans happy about Tom Holland at the moment \u2014 the gossip columnists are enjoying the news that Holland and his Spidey co-star Zendaya, who plays MJ, are a couple.\u00a0", "", "
Zendaya\u00a0also stars in Dune.(Supplied: Warner Bros.)
", "With the pair promoting No Way Home together, there will no shortage of articles written about the A-list 20-somethings in the weeks and months to come.", "
Sony's spin-offs
", "Sony hasn't been shy about cashing in on their golden goose, which has been greeted with more tempered enthusiasm from the fans and critics.", "A second Venom film starring Tom Hardy as the symbiote-infused anti-hero came out recently and is the second-biggest grossing US film of the latter half of 2021, but more are on the way as Sony mines its trove of villains in the hope of making as many Spider-Man-adjacent films as it can.", "", "
Tom Hardy stars in\u00a0Venom: Let There Be Carnage.(Supplied: Sony)
", "Jared Leto will star as Morbius, the Living Vampire in a movie due in January 2022, while Aaron Taylor-Johnson (who played Quicksilver in Avengers: Age Of Ultron) is slated to star as Kraven The Hunter in a film due in January 2023.", "But Sony is just getting started - a further seven films and two TV series have been mooted for the so-called Sony Spider-Man Universe franchise, including an untitled film from Olivia Wilde believed to be about Spider-Woman AKA Jessica Drew, and standalone movies introducing characters such as Silk, Jackpot and Madame Web, who are little known outside comic book readers."]
